verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> toward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> And say לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֡ה <WH3069> GOD יַעַן֩ <WH3282> Because אָמְרֵ֨ךְ <WH559> Because thou saidst הֶאָ֜ח <WH1889> Aha אֶל־ <WH413> and against מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <WH4720> against my sanctuary כִֽי־ <WH3588> when נִחָ֗ל <WH2490> when it was profaned וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against אַדְמַ֤ת <WH127> and against the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> when נָשַׁ֔מָּה <WH8074> when it was desolate וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and against the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כִּ֥י <WH3588> when הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> when they went בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> into captivity

לָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> I am going נֹתְנָ֨ךְ <WH5414> Behold therefore I will deliver לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> thee to the men קֶ֜דֶם <WH6924> of the east לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֗ה <WH4181> for a possession וְיִשְּׁב֤וּ <WH3427> and they shall set טִירֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH2918> their palaces בָּ֔ךְ וְנָ֥תְנוּ <WH5414> in thee and make בָ֖ךְ מִשְׁכְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4908> their dwellings הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> they יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> in thee they shall eat פִרְיֵ֔ךְ <WH6529> thy fruit וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <WH8354> and they shall drink חֲלָבֵֽךְ׃ <WH2461> thy milk

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> רַבָּה֙ <WH7237> Rabbah לִנְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> a stable גְמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> for camels וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon לְמִרְבַּץ־ <WH4769> a couchingplace צֹ֑אן <WH6629> for flocks וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because מַחְאֲךָ֣ <WH4222> Because thou hast clapped יָ֔ד <WH3027> [thine] hands וְרַקְעֲךָ֖ <WH7554> and stamped בְּרָ֑גֶל <WH7272> with the feet וַתִּשְׂמַ֤ח <WH8055> and rejoiced בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שָֽׁאטְךָ֙ <WH7589> with all thy despite בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> in heart אֶל־ <WH413> against אַדְמַ֖ת <WH127> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold נָטִ֨יתִי <WH5186> Behold therefore I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֜י <WH3027> mine hand עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> against וּנְתַתִּ֤יךָ־ <WH5414> upon thee and will deliver [לְבַג כ] (לְבַז֙ <WH897> spoil ק) לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> to the heathen וְהִכְרַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH3772> and I will cut thee off מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> from the people וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךָ <WH6> and I will cause thee to perish מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> out of the countries אַשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <WH8045> I will destroy וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> thee and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because אֲמֹ֤ר <WH559> do say מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> that Moab וְשֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> and Seir הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold כְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> [is] like unto all the heathen בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> Behold the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going פֹתֵ֜חַ <WH6605> Therefore behold I will open אֶת־ <WH853> כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> the side מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> from the cities מֵֽעָרָ֖יו <WH5892> from his cities מִקָּצֵ֑הוּ <WH7097> [which are] on his frontiers צְבִ֗י <WH6643> the glory אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> of the country בֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁימֹ֔ת <WH1020> Bethjeshimoth בַּ֥עַל מְע֖וֹן <WH1186> Baalmeon [וְקִרְיָתְמָה כ] (וְקִרְיָתָֽיְמָה׃ <WH7156> Kiriathaim ק)

לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> Unto the men קֶ֙דֶם֙ <WH6924> of the east עַל־ <WH5921> along בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> and will give לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֑ה <WH4181> them in possession לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִזָּכֵ֥ר <WH2142> may not be remembered בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the nations

וּבְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> upon Moab אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> And I will execute שְׁפָטִ֑ים <WH8201> judgments וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> hath dealt אֱד֛וֹם <WH123> Because that Edom בִּנְקֹ֥ם <WH5358> by taking נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> vengeance לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> against the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֶּאְשְׁמ֥וּ <WH816> and hath greatly אָשׁ֖וֹם <WH816> offended וְנִקְּמ֥וּ <WH5358> and revenged בָהֶֽם׃

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְנָטִ֤תִי <WH5186> I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> upon Edom וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast וּנְתַתִּ֤יהָ <WH5414> from it and I will make חָרְבָּה֙ <WH2723> it desolate מִתֵּימָ֔ן <WH8487> from Teman וּדְדָ֖נֶה <WH1719> and they of Dedan בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> shall fall

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> And I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> נִקְמָתִ֜י <WH5360> my vengeance בֶּאֱד֗וֹם <WH123> upon Edom בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and they shall do בֶאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> in Edom כְּאַפִּ֖י <WH639> according to mine anger וְכַחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> and according to my fury וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> and they shall know אֶת־ <WH853> נִקְמָתִ֔י <WH5360> my vengeance נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD פ

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> have dealt פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> Because the Philistines בִּנְקָמָ֑ה <WH5360> by revenge וַיִּנָּקְמ֤וּ <WH5358> and have taken נָקָם֙ <WH5359> vengeance בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <WH7589> with a despiteful בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> heart לְמַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH4889> to destroy אֵיבַ֥ת <WH342> hatred עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [it] for the old

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נוֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> Behold I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> upon the Philistines וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <WH3772> and I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כְּרֵתִ֑ים <WH3774> the Cherethims וְהַ֣אֲבַדְתִּ֔י <WH6> and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> the remnant ח֥וֹף <WH2348> coast הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> And I will execute בָם֙ נְקָמ֣וֹת <WH5360> vengeance גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> great בְּתוֹכְח֖וֹת <WH8433> rebukes חֵמָ֑ה <WH2534> upon them with furious וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֥י <WH5414> when I shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> נִקְמָתִ֖י <WH5360> my vengeance בָּֽם׃ ס
